rationalized languages in langUsage
changed editor names to URIs
Automatic insertion of lb tags into origs to match existing lb tags in the reg
Third automated transfer of accents across reg-orig pairs
changed type=inWord to break=no
Second automated transfer of accents across reg-orig pairs
Automatically updated revision description
Automated transfer of accents across reg-orig pairs
moved linebreak and missing characters into reg
updated markup for fractions (rend=tick)
batch converted all tei:sic to tei:orig and tei:corr to tei:reg
changed schema; added xml:space=preserve; indented; changed sic to surplus; moved title/@n to idno
Added language la-Grek; tagged num rend=fraction
Converted from TEI P4 (EpiDoc DTD v. 6) to P5 (EpiDoc RNG schema)
Automated split from transcoder files
